entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
